Name: Schneckenbecken dysplasia
Synonyms_List__c: Chondrodysplasia lethal neonatal with snail like pelvis
Disease_Description__c: Schneckenbecken dysplasia is a perinatally lethal skeletal dysplasia. The German term 'Schneckenbecken' refers to the distinctive, snail-like appearance of the ilia that results from a medial bone projection from the inner iliac margin. Other hallmarks of the disorder include thoracic hypoplasia, severe flattening of the vertebral bodies, and short, thick long bones (summary by Hiraoka et al., 2007).
